H0.text: Formula 1 - On which racetrack was the World Champion Ayrton Senna killed. Monza

H1.text: Formula 1 - On which racetrack was the World Champion Ayrton Senna killed. Spa-Francorchamps

H2.text: Formula 1 - On which racetrack was the World Champion Ayrton Senna killed. Silverstone

H3.text: Formula 1 - On which racetrack was the World Champion Ayrton Senna killed. IMOLA

A4.text: The 1994 Imola layout was never again used for a Formula One race.

A5.text: The event where Ayrton Senna died was referred to as the 1994 Imola event.
